title: EP 410: Frankly Speaking: FB, @frankcurzio, H, Yield and Earnings Reports
itunes:title: Frankly Speaking: FB, @frankcurzio, H, Yield and Earnings Reports
description: We start today with some feedback from Todd about Facebook (FB). The first is a question from Joel who wants to know what were the best ideas from last week's Ira Sohn Conference. The best idea was Hyatt (H). Michael writes in asking about shorting utilities. Howard writes in to ask about volatility and portfolio diversification. Mauricio wants to know more about how to interpret earnings reports.  If you’d like to know about Frank’s special discount offers just . And don’t forget send in your questions
